channel.title: I got a rscd v25 source i need help somone please
channel.description: Ok so i did my best to set everything up. I was able to do everything accept start the apache, and get the server to connect to the world. It says java attempting to connect to ls. I fooled with the ls file and still could not get it to connect. I registered at localhost and everything. I have all the correct files for the source i think i am needing of help at one spot or another. email me mattbwhatup2003@yahoo.com , and or pm mattbwhatup2003@live.com

item.title: I got a rscd v25 source i need help somone please
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

Apache is for your website its not needed for the game and port 80 isnt needed for the game. the oly port you need is 43594 or 43595 depending on what ure thing is.

Read full topic
item.source: I got a rscd v25 source i need help somone please

item.title: I got a rscd v25 source i need help somone please
item.dc:creator: @insane_pk insane pk
item.description:
@insane_pk wrote:

im not in front of my rscd source atm but i noticed that my port 80 is blocked. And i thought that port was needed for the apache? i cant click apache install bat and keep it running. Having issues connecting the apache and i think i may be haveing port issues . I click runs ls server then when i click run server it say the rscd is running but keeps saying attempting to connect to ls over and over again instead of connecting to world. Any suggestions?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 11:00:08 am[/size][hr]I have changed the localhost to my ip address and still says same thing. I click start apache batch and i get 0s 10048 only one useage of each socket address protocol/network/address/port is normally permitted. make sock could not bind to address 0.0.0.0:80. no listening sockets available shutting down. When i use the apache install batch file it says 0s 5 access is denied.Failed to open the winnt service manager. now er start apache 2.2, the service name is invalid. NET HELPMSG 2185. when i click run ls server it says build failed. and when i click run server it says rscd server starting up. attempting to connect to ls over and over again.

Read full topic
